mapper.sql: id, companyid, name, major, num, address, degree, money, gmtCreate, gmtModify, dr,lapse
mapper.delete: delete from job where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and id not in(select jobid from userjob)
mapper.insert: insert into job (id, companyid, name, major, num, address, degree, money, gmtCreate, gmtModify, dr, lapse,jobDescribe ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dr,jdbcType=BIT},#{lapse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{jobDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

insert into job
id,
companyid,
name,
major,
num,
address,
degree,
money,
gmtCreate,
gmtModify,
dr,
lapse,
jobDescribe,

mapper.update:
update job
companyid = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmtModify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobDescribe = #{jobDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
lapse = #{lapse,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update job set companyid = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmtModify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobDescribe = #{jobDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, lapse = #{lapse,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
